mapper.select: select shop.id, shop.`name`, shop.establishTime, shop.kind, shop.status, shop.isDelete, shop.img, shop.tag ,shop.description from shop where shop.isDelete = 0
mapper.update: update shop set shop.`name` = #{name}, shop.kind = #{kind}, shop.status = #{status}, shop.tag = #{tag} where shop.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into shop(id, `name`,establishTime, kind, status, tag , description, isDelete) values (#{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{date},#{unitId}, 0,#{tag}, #{description}, 0)
